results.title: Acute Esophageal Necrosis as a Rare Complication of Metabolic Acidosis in a Diabetic Patient: A Case Report
results.text_hl: Among the causative factors of @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@metabolic acidosis@@@ leading to @<m>DISEASE_Esophagitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004941 @@@esophageal necrosis@@@ we recognized @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@.

citations.NLM: Greco S, Giovine A, Rocchi C, Resca R, Bigoni R, Formigaro L, Angeletti AG, Fabbri N, Bonazza A, Feo CV. Acute Esophageal Necrosis as a Rare Complication of Metabolic Acidosis in a Diabetic Patient: A Case Report Am J Case Rep. 2023 Aug 15;24():e939624. PMID: 37580902

results.title: Metformin's Effects on Apoptosis of Esophageal Carcinoma Cells and Normal Esophageal Epithelial Cells: An In Vitro Comparative Study
results.text_hl: ...The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Esophagitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004941 @@@esophageal@@@ normal @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@and carcinoma@@@ cells remains poorly understood.

citations.NLM: Peng J, Jing X, Wu J, Hong D, Hu X, Wang Q, Hu H, Cai X. Metformin's Effects on Apoptosis of Esophageal Carcinoma Cells and Normal Esophageal Epithelial Cells: An In Vitro Comparative Study Biomed Res Int. 2020;2020():1068671. PMID: 32258099
